item.title: SQL-merge into statement
item.description:
I was assigned to implement the function of synchronizing from different databases.
The company currently has an ERP system.
All data sources are based on this standard, so that customers can create , update, write to ERP,
and synchronize with ERP in their own systems…

item.title: Leetcode(Medium) 146. LRU Cache (Python)
item.description:
LRU Cache can be regarded as an interesting topic that I have encountered, and I feel that it is also a concept that will be used in many systems.
Unfortunately, I never encountered this problem on my job yet…

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - Jeepney + Cebu Theme Park Day Trip
item.description: Experienced the long-awaited Cebu common transportation Jeepney and the largest and newest theme park in Cebu : Anjo World Theme Park.

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - Simala Church Day Trip
item.description: I was fortunate enough to visit the Simala Church, the largest church in Cebu. This article mainly records the itinerary planning at that time, the mass participation and the majestic architecture.

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - Christmas in Cebu
item.description: After December, the number of new students in language schools generally decreases, because most students need to go back to their hometown for New Yearâ€™s Eve, or come after the Lunar New Year. I am very happy to experience the local festive atmosphere during this time, but sometimes I still feel a little bit sad.ðŸ˜‚

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - Daily life Part 2
item.description: Jsut want to record the daily life of the language school and the environment of city when I lived in Cebu. My purpose at that time was increase english skills for interview, So there is no itinerary such as island hopping or nightlife.

item.title: Study tour in Cebu - pre-departure mood record
